message: Mink drags us both into the hall, attracting curious looks from the men standing there.
He pulls us through an open door at the end of the hall. It leads to the room where those men attacked me.
Several men are already there. With us, plus the gawkers from the hallway, the room is filled to capacity.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ngh."
Mink tosses me aside, then throws the other guy to the ground.

name: 電話の人
message: "Ngh! M-Mink, sir, I'm so sorry! I'm so sorry!"
All the color has drained from his face. He crawls backward on his ass, staring wild-eyed up at Mink.

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Looks like someone's gonna get disciplined."

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "Sure does. But what'd this chucklefuck even do?"

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Beats me. Must've been a massive fuckup, whatever it was. Mink is pissed."

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "Think that other guy is in for it too?"

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Gotta be."
Disciplined? That can't mean anything good.

name: 電話の人
message: "Eek! Please! Have mercy!"
Mink looks down at the man, stonefaced, and grabs him by the collar.

name: 電話の人
message: "Ugh!"
There's a dull thwack, the sound of bone against bone, and the man's head snaps back like a ragdoll's.
He twitches once, twice, eyes rolling back to show the whites. Blood spurts from his mouth, and pieces of tooth drop to the floor like grains of rice.
This Mink guy has to be crazy strong to knock a man out with one punch like that.
While I'm staring dumbstruck at the spectacle, all eyes go to me.
I really don't like where this is going.
Some of the men are grinning. They're smiles say you're next.
Oh, hell no!
First, I'm almost gang raped, and now I'm gonna get beaten to a pulp? What'd I do?!
As if to make matters worse, my head starts throbbing too.
I don't have my bag, so I don't have my medicine or Ren. And there's no way I'm making a break for it, not with this many guys surrounding me.
...I'm fucked.
Mink takes one step toward me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Fuck off! Just leave me alone!"
I drop back and Mink follows, closing the gap with his long strides.
I can still see the man out of the corner of my eye, lying in a pool of his own blood.
I don't wanna end up like that! I brace myself for the impact.
But then―

name: ミンク
message: "You're coming with me."
Instead of punching my lights out, Mink grabs my arm and starts walking toward the door.

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "The fuck? He's not gettin' disciplined?"

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "You mean Mink didn't bring that guy in to beat on him?"

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Fuck if I know... What the hell else is he good for?"
The crowd shoots piercing glares my way as we pass.
I guess they were all convinced I was in for a beating.
Hell, even I thought so.
Mink obviously hears what they're saying, but he doesn't react in the slightest.
What's going to happen to me now?!
